assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors of this article declare that they have no conflicts of interest in the undertaking of this research study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the Royal Children’s Hospital Human Research Ethics Committee. Informed consent was obtained from each participant before any interviews were conducted.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: No animal studies were carried out by the authors for this article.
